About the Company: Trimurthi Drugs & Pharmaceuticals Ltd is engaged in the manufacturing, distribution, marketing and trading of pharmaceutical products.The Companys range of products include antibiotics, anti ulcer, anti inflammatory, antitussive/expectorant, cardiovascular, anti fungal, anti retroviral drugs, syrups and protein powder. .The company also in the business segment of Pharma Business, Financial Activity.
